description.summary: library for common error values and messages in GnuPG components (development)
description.p: Library that defines common error values for all GnuPG components. Among these are GPG, GPGSM, GPGME, GPG-Agent, libgcrypt, pinentry, SmartCard Daemon and possibly more in the future.
This package contains the headers and other files needed to compile against this library.
